ships.name: Stratos
ships.description: An old but reliable starter scout ship; given for free and cannot be lost permanently.

ships.name: Zenith
ships.description: The Zenith is an agile starship developed to be able to hold its own in combat with normal fighters.

ships.name: Falcon
ships.description: The Falcon is a swift starship designed for overtaking other ships in warp and having unmatched speed on the battlefield.

ships.name: Sabre
ships.description: The Sabre is a powerful ship that makes up for its lack in speed with impressive firepower and tanking ability.

ships.name: Aurora
ships.description: The Aurora is a general-purpose fighter spacecraft that can perform well in a large array of situations.

ships.name: Marlin
ships.description: The Marlin is a nimble vessel that is designed to mine efficiently but be capable of making a quick escape when necessary.

ships.name: Badger
ships.description: The Badger is an entry-level miner-class ship best suited as a starter mining ship. While it mines very efficiently, it's less capable of making a quick escape.

ships.name: Luminar
ships.description: Based on the Aurora chassis, the Luminar is an advanced fighter whose heavy shields give it a distinct advantage in combat situations.

ships.name: Claymore
ships.description: The Claymore, an advanced upgrade of the successful Sabre chassis, is a hull tanking machine with remarkably strong damage output.

ships.name: Polaris
ships.description: The Polaris is an advanced upgrade of the Zenith design that generally improves upon its speed, offense, and defense.

ships.name: Paragon
ships.description: An advanced upgraded variant of the Falcon, the Paragon is one of the fastest and most agile ships in the galaxy.

ships.name: Spectator
ships.description: Admin-only ship for testing. In the orignal Starscape, it was also used for spectating events.
